Articles.Content:
Please consider allowing the final node_stack argument or NODE{} size to simply be specified as their meter size (i.e. 0.625, 1.25, 2.5 etc)

This would allow better control than the current 0/1/2 system as well being open to mods which could then specify their own discrete sizes (such as 3.75m or 5m for things like HOME, NP or KWR and 1/2/3m for CHAKA etc or even sizes smaller than 0.625 (size 0) for small parts which can appear completely enclosed within their node indicator bubbles in the VAB/SPH

Edited January 26, 2014 by NoMrBond
Clarity
